DOC.brief_summary: The Rheumatoid Arthritis DMARD Intervention and Utilization Study (RADIUS 1) is designed to systematically collect and document use patterns, effectiveness, and safety of DMARD treatments currently used in the management of rheumatoid arthritis (RA). It is anticipated that study data may help improve the quality of information upon which clinical decisions are based.
DOC.criteria: Fulfillment of the 1987 American Rheumatism Association criteria for RA Currently requiring a new DMARD (change or addition) Currently enrolled in a clinical trial with treatments or patient visits imposed by a protocol Nursing or pregnant women Patients with active infection
